description: The first analytics and automation platform purpose-built for growth marketing teams to unlock faster and more efficient revenue growth.
title: Roadway | Growth Marketing Analytics & Automation Platform
introduction: Roadway is an analytics and automation platform designed for growth marketing, offering personalized insights and automation to help businesses scale revenue faster and more efficiently. It focuses on metrics, growth levers, and self-serve analytics to drive data-driven decisions.
features: Personalized Growth Marketing Copilot for analysis and insight automation
Growth-focused insights with automated metric and funnel analysis
Suggestions for action tailored to business and growth channels
Automatic modeling for key metrics and attribution logic
Self-serve access to source-of-truth metrics with warehouse-native analytics
Simple workspace for creating dashboards and reports
targetPeople: Businesses looking to accelerate revenue growth through data-driven marketing strategies

faqs.answer: Roadway AI helps businesses focus on important metrics and growth levers, automate data analysis and insight processes, and make data-driven decisions faster through self-serve analytics.
